name: Dual Hurl
description:
Perform a charged throw with your hatchet. If you charge it to the maximum, you will throw both of your hatchets at the same time. (Mid stance only).
Command: Hold Triangle

name: Mountain Climber II
description: Press Square button after using Mountain Climber to strike downwards at your enemy as you land. (Low Stance Only).
prerequesite:
Mountain Climber

Cleared Mission "

The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Mountain Climber
description:
Leaps over an enemy to get behin them. (Low Stance Only).
Command: L3 UP + X button at end of combo.
prerequesite:
Chain Hurl II
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Advancing Storm
description:
Run forward, launching into a somersault and flinging, your hatches at the enemy.
Command: Hold Square while running

name: Tile Shaker
description: Parries an enemy attack, neutralizing it. (Mid Stance Only).

name: Biting Hail
description:
Evade an attack while flinging your hatches at you foe. (Low Stance Only).
Command: Triangle button while dodging.

name: Dual Hurl: Light
description:
Decrease the charge time when performing Dual Hurl. (Mid stance only).
Command: Hold triangle button.

name: Dual Hurl: Shadow
description:
Increases the distance of the throw when you charge your attack further. (Mid stance Only).
Command: Hold triangle button.

name: Relentless I
description: Maximun Ki increasses by +30 when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Spiked Wall
description: Unleash a powerful slash with both hatchets from your guard position, repelling the enemy's attack. Heavily staggers the enemy if succesful. (Mid Stance Only)

name: Relentless II
description: Maximun Ki increasses by +20 when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Relentless I Mountain Hawk
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Relentless III
description: Maximun Ki increasses by +10 when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Demon Undercut
description: Throw the hatchet in your right hand at a targeted enemy's feet and cause a large amount of Ki damage (Mid stance only)

name: Cornered Boar I
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, the damage you receive is reduced by 15% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Cornered Boar II
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, the damage you receive is reduced by 10% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Cornered Boar III
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, the damage you receive is reduced by 5% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Cornered Boar II
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Spinning Crab
description:
Perform a low spinning attack with both hatchets, aimed at the enemy's feet. If the enemy is humanoid and their Ki is reduced to zero, they will fall over. (Low stance only).
Triangle button at end of combo.

name: Shadow Strike I
description: Damage dealt to enemies from behind increases by 3% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Shadow Strike II
description: Damage dealt to enemies from behind increases by 2% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Shadow Strike III
description: Damage dealt to enemies from behind increases by 1% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Shadow Strike II
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Eagle's Shadow
description:
Throws hatchets in a wide arc. Will reach the targeted enemy if locked on. (Low stance only).
Command: L1 + Triangle button (triangle while guarding).
prerequesite:
Chain Hurl
Cleared Mission "The Last Sun On Mount Tenno".

name: Chain Hurl
description:
Charge your attack and throw both of your hatchets, one after another (Low stance only).
Command: Hold Triangle button.

name: Chain Hurl II
description: Prees triangle repeatdly to chain your throws. (Low stance only)

name: Wolf's Rage
description: Instantly recover from being repelled by an enemy's guard and deal a guard-breaking blow with your hatchet.

name: Death From Above
description:
Jump into the air and strike the gorund with your hatchets. (Mid stance only).
Command: Hold triangle button.

name: Indomitable Spirit I
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, your Ki recovery speed will increase by 15% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Indomitable Spirit II
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, your Ki recovery speed will increase by 10% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Indomitable Spirit III
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, your Ki recovery speed will increase by 5% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Indomitable Spirit II
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Passage to the Afterlife I
description: Increases grapple damage by 4% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Passage to the Afterlife II
description: Increases grapple damage by 3% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Passage to the Afterlife III
description: Increases grapple damage by 2% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Passage to the Afterlife II
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Lethal Barrage
description:
At the end of a combo, change to a backhanded grip and repeatedly strike the enemy. Repeatedly press triangle to increase the hit count. (High stance only).
Command: triangle button at end of combo.

name: Lethal Barrage II
description: Follow up a lethal Barrage with your a powerful attack by presing square. (High stance only).

name: Cornered Tiger I
description: When your health is below 30%, your melee damage will be increased by 15% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Cornered Tiger II
description: When your health is below 30%, your melee damage will be increased by 10% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Cornered Tiger III
description: When your health is below 30%, your melee damage will be increased by 5% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Cornered Tiger II
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Piercing Hurl
description:
Perform a charged throw with your hatchet. If you charge it to the maximum, the weapon will tear through the enemy on impact. (High stance only).
Command: Hold triangle button.

name: Piercing Hurl : Light
description:
Decreases the charge time when performing Piercirng Hurl. (High stance only).
Command: Hold triangle button.

name: Piercing Hurl: Shadow
description:
Increases the distance of the throw when you charge your atack further. (High stance only).
Command: Hold triangle button.

name: Full Moon Kata I
description: While in full health, your melee damage increases by 3% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.

name: Full Moon Kata II
description: While in full health, your melee damage increases by 2% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Full Moon Kata I
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenne".

name: Full Moon Kata III
description: While in full health, your melee damage increases by 1% when you have hatchets equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Full Moon Kata II
Cleared Mission "???"

name: Heaven's Clash
description:
Build up power before throwing your hatches in an arc. (Mid Stance Only).
Command: L1 + Square (Square while guarding).

name: Bell Ringer
description:
Thrust your hatchets directly in front of you, forcing your enemies to retreat. (Mid Stance Only).
Command: triangle button at end of combo.
prerequesite:
Death for Above
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Mountain Hawk
description:
Follow up a Quick Attack by fringing your hatchets at the enemy. (Mid Stance Orly).
Command: Hold triangle button.
prerequesite:
Dual Hurl: Light
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Dragonfly
description:
Spin your hatchets at high speed as they hang in mid-air, inflicting damage on nearby foe . (High/Mid Stance Only).
Command: L1 + Square button (Square while guardian).
prerequesite:
Piercing Hurl: Light
Cleared Mission "The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno".

name: Dragonfly II
description: Allows you to charge up the Dragonfly skill so that your spiming hatchets will hang in th for longer. (High/Mid Stance Only)

name: Greaed Lightning
description:
Only usable when hatchets are sheathed. Charge up your power before unleashing two mighty strikes upon the enemy.
Command: Hold R1 + Square Button.

name: Boulder Breaker
description:
Only usable when hatchets are sheathed. Charge up your power before throwing your hatchets forward.
Command: Hold R1 + Square button.

name: All Ablaze
description:
Only usable when hatchets are sheathed. Increases your attack power and movement weed in exchange for sacrificing some defense.
Command: Hold R1 + Square

name: Arise
description:
Press triangle button when you are downed to attack while springing back up.
Command: triagle while downed.
